original_text: But instead, the man went away and he talked to everybody. He told them what had happened to him. Because he did this, it became too difficult for Jesus to go into the towns. Everybody knew him. So Jesus stayed in places in the wilderness. People came from all the places around there to see him.
korean_text: 그러나 그 사람이 나가서 이 일을 많이 전파하여 널리 퍼지게 하니 그러므로 예수께서 다시는 드러나게 동네에 들어가지 못하시고 오직 바깥 한적한 곳에 계셨으나 사방에서 사람들이 그에게로 나아오더라

sentences.original_text: But instead, the man went away
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 대신 그 사람은 떠나갔습니다

sentences.original_text: He told them what had happened to him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들에게 자신에게 일어난 일을 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: it became too difficult for Jesus
People came from all the places around there
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 그 주변의 모든 곳에서 왔습니다
